challenge: Streamlining vehicle inspection booking and document management for BMV processes
solution: A platform that allows users to book appointments for BVM inspections. It includes an admin dashboard for managing appointments and documents, a client portal for uploading files, OCR data extraction or manual entry, and integrated payment processing.
quote: The BMV inspection platform has revolutionized how we handle vehicle inspections. The OCR technology and streamlined booking system have significantly improved our efficiency.
author: Marie Dubois

challenge: Creating a peer-to-peer car rental platform to compete with major players like Turo
solution: A complete peer-to-peer car rental platform inspired by Turo, built on a modern microservices architecture.
quote: Saraya Auto Rental has transformed the car rental landscape in our region. The microservices architecture ensures scalability and reliability.
author: Ahmed Diallo

challenge: Building a comprehensive marketplace connecting sellers and buyers with advanced features
solution: A modern marketplace that connects sellers and buyers. It enables store creation, product and service sales, delivery management, and integrated messaging between clients and vendors.
quote: iSaraya has created a vibrant marketplace ecosystem. The integrated messaging and delivery management features have been game-changers for our business.
author: Fatou Ndiaye

challenge: Digital transformation of clinic management for Mauritania Internal Medicine and Pediatrics
solution: A clinic management interface for Mauritania Internal Medicine and Pediatrics (MIMAP). It supports management of consultations, prescriptions, lab tests, and medical certificates.
quote: The MIMAP platform has transformed our clinic operations. Managing consultations, prescriptions, and certificates is now seamless and efficient.
author: Dr. Mohamed Lemine

challenge: Creating a comprehensive platform for tech education and training programs
solution: Official website of the American Senegalese Tech Academy (ASTA), offering intensive Full Stack development programs and professional training tailored to regional market needs.
quote: ASTA has become the leading tech education platform in Senegal. Our graduates are highly sought after by employers across the region.
author: Professor Amadou Ba

challenge: Digital transformation of vocational training accreditation processes
solution: Digital platform for the General Directorate of Vocational and Technical Training (DGFPT), designed to manage accreditation requests and teaching authorization processes.
quote: The DGFPT platform has modernized our accreditation processes. The digital system has significantly improved efficiency and transparency.
author: Mamadou Sow

challenge: Creating a professional online presence for SarayaTech Senegal's services and portfolio
solution: Official website of Saraya Tech Senegal presenting the company, its services, projects, and team.
quote: Our new website perfectly represents SarayaTech's expertise and innovation. It has significantly increased our project inquiries and brand visibility.
author: Cheikh Diop
